news_scraper.tests.unit_tests.test_rss_parsers module¶

Unit test for rss_feed_parsers.py

Note that this is not maintained any more.

news_scraper.tests.unit_tests.test_rss_parsers.mocked_rss_feed_parse(url)[source]¶

To replase feedparser.parse function to mock scraping news from the Internet.

HTTP connections take time, and RSS feeds change very frequently, so use mock to use previously stored RSS feed objects instead.
